name: OMSI Scenery Object Configuration File
summary: Learn about .SCO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The SCO file is made up of lines of data following a keyword (whether it's for a script or description). The format looks like this:
OMSI will only read lines of data that are in this format.

description: Configuration file created by OMSI The Bus Simulator, an omnibus driving simulator; contains configuration data for scenery objects that appear during gameplay, such as trees and buildings; can be customized; similar to other OMSI configuration files like .HUM, .SLI, .BUS, and .OVH files.
